scripts.build: npm run openapi && cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run openapi && cd client && npm install --production=false && npm run build && npm prune && cd ../server && npm install --production=false && npm run build && npm prune
scripts.dev: npm run openapi && concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
